Ilia:
Share fresh rumours with you?
It is said that in the Guild of Black Anvil create belts that give their owners unprecedented power! It is also said that the Keys to the Secret Room are at the lord of the Ruined Castle Gustav, the mistress of the Fortress of the Restless Lydia von Helman and the Bloody Monarch nurka, who live in the Fortification partizan.
And the last, perhaps: it turns out, there is a way to improve the powers of the Ruler!
